pageContext.claim: “So we do all these tests, and we find pockets, and we find people, and we find cases. And they say, ‘The cases have jumped,’ instead of saying what a job we're doing with testing. But we did the job with testing.”
pageContext.analysis: This is nonsense. Testing is a means to an end, not an end unto itself. They show that coronavirus cases have jumped -- because the disease has been spreading for months, abetted in part by lax and inconsistent public health measures from Trump and other U.S. political leaders.
